attributes.action: Scotland to stay in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
This is a plea to the ‘silent majority’ of Scots to start campaigning to stop this Independence madness.

I am a very proud Scot – but  who created the problems we face -  not the English, think Blair, Brown, Darling, Cook, Goodwin, Cummings et al.

I submit this e-petition in the hope that there are hopefully like minds. I am a proud Kilmarnock, Ayrshire, Scots, British man – I don’t need Independence to prove it!
